Changelog¶

ver 0.1.11¶

  • signal submodule added: functions to filter and analyze univariate data.

  • linalg module added: linear algebra operations on collections.

  • xrdb module added: basic support for x-ray databases.

  • added read_fdicts() function (utils module).

  • fixed bug in derivative computation of get_mapped_data() function (thanks to M. Desmau).

  • updated tutorials.
